Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class VirtualClient extends Object implements Runnable
A class that represents the client inside the server.
